General.Name: Kolmar Holding
General.Description: Kolmar Korea Holdings Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and health functional foods in South Korea and internationally. It offers skin care, makeup, hair care, body care, and baby products, as well as functional cosmetics and perfumes. The company also provides quasi-drugs and health supplements. Kolmar Korea Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Sejong City, South Korea.
